alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 1:37PM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, reducing visibility below one mile at times. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Centennial Mountains, Island Park-Beaverhead Region, and Lemhi Highlands, including but not limited to Island Park, Kilgore, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, and Small. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
